sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"电的"之意。
means: electric ： 强调与电有直接的关系。一般而言，凡表示产生电的或由电开动、操纵的机器或装置要用electric,如electric motor(电动机)，electric batteries(电池)、electric fan(电扇)等；或表示"本身带电的"，"由电产生的"要用electric,如electric current(电流)、electric wave(电波)、electric arc(电弧)等。
electrical ： 强调与电的关系是间接的。凡指电气性质，同电有关的或涉及电气科学技术研究的多用electrical，如electrical test(电气试验)、electrical engineering(电气工程)、electrical fault(电气故障)、electrical noise(电噪声)、electrical engineer(电气工程师)等。
electronic是electronics(电子学)的形容词，指与电子装置有关的或使用电子装置的。

word_mean: electronic-controlled printer 利用电子装置自动补偿像点反差的原理晒印像片的设备。

sentence.Network_en: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.

sentence.Network_en: The company invested thousands in an electronic order-control system.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司耗资数千购买了一套电子订单管理系统。

sentence.Network_en: It was a seamless procession of wonderful electronic music.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一曲优美流畅的电子乐曲。

entry.def: An electronic device has transistors or silicon chips which control and change the electric current passing through the device.

entry.tran: 电子化的;使用电子装置的
entry.def: An electronic process or activity involves the use of electronic devices.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或科学"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: academy专科院校,研究院+ic……的→academic学院的
ascet练习+ic……的→adj.禁欲的 n.苦行者
elast+ic……的→adj.弹性的
electron电子+ic……的→adj.电子的
fan狂热者+at+ic……的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: magnet磁体,磁铁+ic……的→adj.磁的,有磁性的,有吸引力的
metr=meter米+ic……的→adj.米制的,公制的
prosa=prose散文+ic……的→像散文一样平淡,无趣
sept感染+ic……的→adj.受感染的,腐败的
stat站+ic……的→站着的,静止的
symmetry[n.对称]+ic……的→symmetric相称性的
vitriol硫酸盐,刻薄话+ic……的→adj.刻薄的,强烈的
geography地理[学]+ic人或科学→geographic地理[学]的
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
psyche灵魂;精神+del看+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.引起幻觉的 n.迷幻药
sopor迷睡,昏睡,酣睡+if+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药

fan狂热者+at+ic……的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 怀疑论者,无神论者,怀疑宗教的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: skept怀疑+ic人或科学→n.怀疑论者,无神论者,怀疑宗教的人
arith数学+met+ic人或科学→n.算术,四则运算
crit评判,批评+ic人或科学→n.批评家,评论家
log说话,词语,思想+ic人或科学→说话的学问→逻辑学
mim模仿+ic人或科学→v.模仿,戏弄 n.模仿他人言行的人
rhetor修辞学者+ic人或科学→n.修辞学,浮夸的言语
sto+ic人或科学→来自古希腊斯多葛派学,主张以苦为乐
an无+alg痛+es+ic药物→n.镇痛剂 adj.止痛的
an无+esthet感觉+ic某种药或医学有关→n.麻醉剂
cathart净化+ic某种药或医学有关→n.泻药
emet呕吐+ic某种药或医学有关→n.催吐药
psyche灵魂;精神+del看+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.引起幻觉的 n.迷幻药
sopor迷睡,昏睡,酣睡+if+ic某种药或医学有关→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药
mim模仿+ic人或科学→v.模仿,戏弄 n.模仿他人言行的人

Sentence.sentence: Amazon, by far the largest bookseller in the country, reported on May 19 that it is now selling more books in its electronic Kindle format than in the old paper-and-ink format.

His product launches, at which he would stand alone on a black stage and produce as if by magic an "incredible" new electronic gadget （小器具）in front of an amazed crowd, were the performances of a master showman.
His rich knowledge as a computer scientist and electronic engineer

In a division of electronic engineers, who were designing equipments so advanced that they work in teams of up to 150, co-workers and managers were asked to nominate the standouts- the stars in productivity and effectiveness
Time away from all electronic gadgets.
